text: No Pads, No Helmets...Just Balls is the first studio album by Canadian pop punk band, Simple Plan. No Pads, No Helmets...Just Balls was released on March 19, 2002 through both Atlantic and Lava. The album debuted at #35 on the Billboard 200 and at #8 on the Canadian Albums Chart. The album was certified 2× Platinum by the RIAA. The album featured the singles "I'm Just a Kid", "I'd Do Anything", "Addicted", and "Perfect". Tracklist: 01\. I’d Do Anything (ft.
